p: Performing 200 charge/discharge cycles in the 0.01–3.0 V potential range of the NCO-5/1 sample resulted in a shift of the maximum from 1.6–1.7 V region towards lower potentials and an increase its intensity. Furthermore, specific capacity increased from 768 to 833 μAh/cm 2/µm from 25 to 200 cycles, respectively (measured at 320 µA/cm 2 for NCO-5/1 ( Figure 6c,d).
